reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great portable fan!
reviews.reviewText: We took this fan with us on an international trip and used it in the hotels that we stayed in. It easily fit in my carry-on luggage. It worked for several hours on one charge and it also works while it’s plugged in. It gives off a lot of air and it was so convenient that it adjusted to varying heights. It worked great for my husband and I for our trip especially since it seems like the hotels would turn off the AC in the middle of the night. The only complaint I have is that the remote doesn’t seem to work. Also, if I had to do it again I would buy the fan that oscillates. Otherwise, I’m extremely happy with this fan and would definitely recommend it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well worth the price!!
reviews.reviewText: Purchased this fan for travel, went through TSA like a breeze, fit in my carry on! Tall enough to have on the floor and and still reached over the hotel bed!! And it oscillates!!! It’s quiet but still has a hum to let you sleep. So if you need a fan to sleep and can’t rely on the hotel air system, this fan is for you!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This saved me in Ghana when power went out
reviews.reviewText: Reliable for years now, give breeze when needed. Holds charge. Compact and nice color. Easy to clean

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars First one lasted a year, second two didn’t last long.
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely adored the first one I bought. I used it on business travel at least 12 times. It packed great, always worked. It died after a year. After what it went through,I didn’t blame it. Bought a second one. After about 6 weeks it would start and do the wind noise part but the fan would not blow air every time I used it. It only worked a few times. So I bought another one and the same exact thing happened. I’m going to try to find something on the internet to help me figure out what could be wrong and reach out to their customer service. So I’ve invested ~$130 and one was awesome.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Buy It! I was surprised by the amount of force this tiny fan pushes out. I am a HOT sleeper, this is fantastic to have next to your bed and the remote makes it that much more better. So far the charge only lasts a few hours, but if you keep the charger in overnight it works just fine! I would 100% buy this again and recommend to anyone. It can be used in so many different ways and is compact. Great Product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super Easy & Strong
reviews.reviewText: I love this fan. It's super compact and easy to collapse or open. It has a small remote with the ability to turn it off and on as well as manage the flow of the wind. It's stronger than it's size would lead you to believe. It definitely suits its purpose to cool a person sitting near by down but it's not strong enough to cool a room or provide more than individual cooling (which I what I bought it for anyway). Great value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 9, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Do NOT buy this fan. Both fans have died. $80 tied up in 2 fans that don't work anymore.
reviews.reviewText: I am coming back to change my review. When WORKING these are great fans. Now BOTH have conked out and will not work. Batteries are the kind that cannot be changed out, so now I have $80 tied up in 2 fans that will not work. I actually always had them plugged in so they would not have to run off the batteries. They need to fix this problem. I have read other reviews where people experience the same problem. I wonder how many of the 5 stars have just not come back to complain but have this issue now. They actually lasted only about 2 months. The first one I did not live where it was kept so not a lot of use then. The new one has been for just under 2 months. I have plug in fans I have had for 15 years, still going strong. This is not acceptable.I have 2 of these now. I liked the first one so much, and I did not want to keep taking it upstairs and downstairs, even though every light weight. It is quiet, almost blows cold air, takes up little space, convenient, folds down small and away for the winter when not needed instead of traditional bulky fans. Not good for open spaces, but to have right in front of you when you are sitting, sleeping, or on a computer, so don't expect it to do areas like the big bulky fans. It is your close up personal fan.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stays Charged works great
reviews.reviewText: I’ve had this fan for a year now and I’ve used it a few times in the last couple of months being plugged into the wall so I had no issues. Recently went on a cruise and there were only 2 charging ports and they were on the other side of the room. I was hoping it would last me a few hours unplugged and going off the chargeable battery! It lasted almost 10 hours not being plugged in the first night! I plugged it back in and let it charge all day again and it lasted the whole night through without being plugged in!!! Get this fan it was a lifesaver!!!!!!!!!

reviews.reviewTitle: Fan is alright but beware the whine.
reviews.reviewText: The fan does deliver a breeze, even at its lowest setting. But at that same lowest setting, a whine is audible and only gets louder if you set the fan speed higher. If that does not bother you, it is a decent purchase. The whine isn't too loud, but it will definitely keep me awake even at lowest setting.
